description.tooltip: So that's [30.6 dollars]... and here's the [change]. We're good. (place coins on counter)
description.desc_shop: So that's [30.6 dollars]... and here's the [change]. We're good. (place coins on counter)
description.desc_demonic: So that's [the flesh]... and here's the [blood]. We're good. (takes all body parts away)
